title: Springtime in the ranges
creator_credit: South Australian Government Tourist Bureau and J.A. Correll
brief_description: Depicts the activities which go on in the South Australian ranges during Spring. Shows the unique natural flora and fauna, and the agricultural pursuits of the area.
